replies.body: You call your teammates "stupid," "kid," "braindead," "ape," and "troll," all while calling for reports, and you think you were chat restricted for no reason?

>This system will never work! Told you this for 3-4 years now!

You don't have any other posts so I assume you said this on other accounts.

>You put people that actually try to win games on pair with trolls, flamers, int feeders!

Matchmaking can't know if someone is going to flame, troll, or feed. It doesn't match based on behavioral standards.

>Ruin good players mood and state of mind by perpetuating this stupid system

Retaliating negative behavior with more negative behavior is what perpetuates the poor mood of the game. Which is why retaliation isn't an excuse that is accepted.

>From 300% more honor then the average player and 10 to 15 honors per day you (riot) try to find useless methods to ruin our rewards and free loot! Riot can't be cheaper and more sneaky then this! (for ex. last time when the troll-feeder calls me r%%%%% for no reason 6 times and i call him stupid once after he ruins my game and mood, thanks for ignoring ALL chat in this process and put me on pair with that creature)

Good behavior doesn't excuse the moments of poor behavior.

Insults and threats to report are peppered throughout your logs. Stop doing either of those. Don't reply to insults with more insults. If you're going to report someone just report them, don't use the existence of the system like a weapon to goad someone in chat.
